html:
PC Number Date Chapter Chapter Year Bill Dept
 2023-12962023-12-14PCH
ActOnline News Act
SubjectOnline News Act Application and Exemption Regulations
PrecisONLINE NEWS ACT APPLICATION AND EXEMPTION REGULATIONS in order to (1) establish the criteria that determine if the Act applies to a digital platform; (2) specify the timeframe for operators of digital platforms to notify the Canadian Radio-television and Telecommunications Commission (CRTC) if the Act applies to them; and (3) provide specific direction on how certain exemption criteria could be met.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/
AttachmentsAttachment
